column3:
“I used to smoke regularly over a decade ago, and quit because of escalating paranoia and anxiety from whatever unknown strains i was smoking from whomever i could get some from.  

After reading about Hawaiian Snow on Leafly, the reviews and effects (a couple years ago), I decided to buy some seeds (Green House Seed Co.) and grow my own since it is still illegal where I live...Hawaiian Snow sounded like a perfect fit...”

“Hawaiian Snow is my very favorite strain, ever! She is exactly what I look for in a variety of herb. I'm a Hawaiian Tour-Guide, surfer, and outdoorsman who is always on the move. So, I look for pure sativas that get me going in the morning, and relieve all and any pain, due to the high CBD. Hawaiian Snow has such a sweet smell and flavor that is like none other. My wife and I smoked the first bowl of our harvest and ...”

“A stimulating sativa perfect for day-time use. Hawaiian snow provides a focused and uplifting effect accompanied with a subtle euphoria. The  unique flavour profile of this strain boasts a delicious tropical citrus taste slightly reminiscent of pineapple. Smell strays slightly from the taste with a faint floral incense aroma, accompanied by both tropical and citrus fragrances. Would recommend Hawaiian snow for anyone...”

“This is some great, great weed. I bought mine from a shop at the Freetown Christiania, in Denmark. 
There was a huge supply of weed in this shop, so me and my girlfriend-friend chose the Hawaiian Snow. Normally when I smoke, I usually just shut up and just.. Relaxing. But this weed was the perfect thing!
It made me and her talk, even though we were stoned out of our minds, we just talked about some really, really c...”

“This is a very powerful sativa. Its genetics are Hawaiian crossed with Laos and it has a thc content measured at 23.7%. The high was very uplifting and energetic, and of very good quality. A two gram blunt kept me and a friend high for a little over four hours, and I loved every minute of it. This bud is good for wake and bakes when you dont have anything important to do that morning. I would definately recommend pic...”

“The buzz is strong and solid. Once the effect is with me, it is definitely with me. Hits hard, stays strong. Very positive feelings, enlightened, happy, calm, energetic. This is a creative high; this is, for me, a high to get busy with, you know? Create, create.”
“It made me reorganize all the furniture in my apartment.  I call it Hawaiian adderall.  Very energized and focused.”

“The Smoke:
  Tastes quite new".  Somewhat acidic and almost sterile tasting.  Tastes like a hospital smells.  short duration from smoke to high onset.  Very heady....a classic sativa.  Arousal and euphoria are the #1 and 2 effects

column2: I would recommend this for a weekend day-time smoke.  Great for watching the game or playing video...”"

column3: “Didn't kick in immediately.....when it did.....very nice.  Makes you want to put on your headphones and start cleaning. Energy, focus.....and you're really really high.”

“As I am now enjoying this lovely bud, I must say that it is quite uplifting (that may have to do with the amazing weather outside). Nonetheless, I will say that the green is exquisite. It got my friend and I very baked in very little time; 0.5 in 5mins and we are higher than Armstrong. 

The taste is sweet, the smoke is crisp and the color is superb. 

I would highly recommend this strain.”
“I hallucinated... Real talk”

“This strain is nuts. Takes a long time to mature and flower. Took an uncured sample and was out of control. I can't imagine what it would be like fully cured. An extreme flow of positive racing thoughts. Makes you hyper analyze everything around you when in public. During quiet times it makes you analyze yourself and your own thoughts obsessively. Gave me some real perspective, which I always appreciate in a strain. ...”

“this is a really sweet tangy smoke -super Fun not really a head high but more of a relaxing cerebral buzz- it's really a nice smelling and tasting smoke probably the top tasting sativas (imo) perfect for a night out or watch a comedy flick- this will really get the giggles going - its a fun strain for a fun night - takes the edge off and relaxes you for a fun day out or evening out - definitely a nice smoke with grea...”
“Very euphoric strain that gets you talking. It hits hard and it hits fast. Smells unique and fantastic. My favorite along with Super Silver Haze.”
“Perfect for the morning when you need to get things done. Relaxed, energetic, focused and you'll be in a great mood.”

“🌴 O.PEN RESERVE 420 Cannabis Oil: AZ GROWN; Pure, Clean, No binders/fillers. One HeadTripy Sexy High! Tastes of tropical Haze, like Hawaiian pinapples. Such Positive Uplifting Energy! An Uninhibited, Free, Open 💖Sensual Artsy Creative Sativa indeed! Instant Mood Elevation Medicine_No Worries"_soo Social & FunSilly
column4: Smiles all around. Blasts thru my f'n Cronic Pain and Arthritis almost instantly!..OH

column3: “This is a delicious unusual strain. Very potent but it comes on softly. Lasts hours on end. Tastes of fruity waters. Nice and tropical. Easy going and relaxing but still able to go about daily business. I'd say any time is a good time to smoke this. Highly recommend!”

“Hawaiian Snow is the Bomb. I love this strain. It has a sweet tropical taste that will remind you of a Hawaiian sunset. The high is awesome and it lasts for a few hours. This strain will make you socialize and laugh more than ever. It also will give you the munchies so watch out, your kitchen will be cleared out in no time. This is a great strain to wind down from a long day at work. Watching the sunset or the stars ...”

“Nice, relaxed feel. I haven't had the munchies in a long time but after some Hawaiian Snow I found myself defrosting a piece of cake & giggling. Sooo... Definitely a mood booster as well as appetite.”

“This strain is pure sativa. All in the head. Yes it is a great sativa. However the body had nothing. Usually at least I get some kind of body sensation... smells like you are cutting up a pineapple mango salad... flawless in the look and smell. With a 28% thc content from Diosa Verde... they know how to do it proper.”

“If you like a Sativa then this a must try. Someone left a review describing the smell, taste liken to a hospital. When I first smelt the bud it reminded me of the smell of a burnt crack pipe, no joke. It's has an acid smell. Best Sativa I've ever had. Amazing high.”

“Wow! I fortunately got a well grown batch of this and fell in love. Another..open the jar to keep smelling strain. Quite a strong head high, in the best way. Music sounds great, creative thoughts flow, laughing is likely, and it tastes really unusual, but oddly delicious. 
I've found it at another dispensary since and the buzz is almost as good, but it totally lacks in taste and flavor compared.”
“Love it!!”

“This strain is often not available since it requires a very long flowering time of 13-14 weeks.  Most growers stay away from stains so time intensive but I didn't and it has paid dividends for me.  As ganga goes, it has the most pleasing and atypical bouquet, being dainty and floral smelling.  Very unique, you'll never forget it.  It tastes delicious in a joint or vaporizer.  The buds are seldom dense and tend to bur...”

“🌴 O.PEN RESERVE 420 Cannabis Oil: AZ GROWN; Pure, Clean, No binders/fillers. One HeadTripy Sexy High! Tastes of tropical Haze, like Hawaiian pinapples. Such Positive Uplifting Energy! An Uninhibited, Free, Open 💖Sensual Artsy Creative Sativa indeed! Instant Mood Elevation Medicine_No Worries"_soo Social & FunSilly
column4: Smiles all around. Blasts thru my f'n Cronic Pain and Arthritis almost instantly!..OH

column3: “A solid euphoric Sativa for influencing creativity while being active. It's a huge help when you're bored or depressed. Wish it would be more euphoric, but no matter how much I smoke I can't seem to hit that next level. Recommend for daytime and socializing.”

“Hawaiian Snow is pure creation; a brain massage that leaves you both relaxed and ethereal.  It starts with a sharp punch to the center of your matter that reels and sways you with romantic abandon.  It knocks you over with primal ecstasy and lets you free fall into a dreamlike pillow, releasing you from pain, personality, and personal anxieties.  A touch of psychotropic space lets your mind drift for a bit before let...”

“Hawaiian Snow is absolutely fantastic. Make no mistake this is a medium throat hit and high super sativa. I suffer from ADD/ADHD, Anxiety, Depression, PTSD and chronic pain. However, taking this friend in my lungs to begin my day really did the trick. Scoring a 94% on my Anatomy II exam today! Later on came home and indulged again and cleaned my room. I have been putting it off for months. Need to get things 
done? M...”

“Method: organic hemp paper pure joint

After the first puffs a nice soothing feeling in all my broken arms and legs. I must say it works miracles if you have sports injuries.
Light clear headed high puts you in an easy going mode. I turned into a YES man.”

“This looks and smells absolutely amazing, and is one of the first Sativas i could actually feel was a sativa. It tasted awesome and was really smooth in everyway i smoked it. 4/5 cause it didnt get me as high as I could have been.”

“My favourite sativa and am more an indica lover but this little lady blew me away. Got it in November 2017 from greenhouse centrum Amsterdam went in first thing in the morning and asked for the SLH but the budtender recommended this for a good morning sativa and it didn’t disappoint good wake and bake smoke for a day walking and smoking in the dam.”
“Quite the head buzz with a very lovely and fruity aroma. Helps a little with pain and relaxes your daily stress.”
“this is one of my favorite strains. Perfect for kick in back and having a good time with friends, gives a gnarly dry mouth though”

“My favourite sativa and am more an indica lover but this little lady blew me away. Got it in November 2017 from greenhouse centrum Amsterdam went in first thing in the morning and asked for the SLH but the budtender recommended this for a good morning sativa and it didn’t disappoint good wake and bake smoke for a day walking and smoking in the dam.”

“This is how it happened:

Me and my buddy were going to Christiania, in Copenhagen, Denmark. A great place to visit if you should ever come to Denmark! 

Anyways we thought we should try something that we had never heard of before. And that's when we saw: 

                                H A W A I I A N   S N O W

We saw how huge the buds were, so we bought for some for around 40$


So we went to the crip, and made ...”

“One of my favourite strains at the moment. In freetown Christiania my typical stand has had it for the last month and I have not been disappointed yet. Each time my high has been euphoric and creative. I can really recommend watching The big Lez show" during your trip. You'll have a really good time!”"

“This strain is a powerhouse for motivation. A couple of hits from my vape and I could feel happy energy buzzing through my spine. I found this helpful for doing housework or creative activities. Perfect for depression.”

“Method: organic hemp paper pure joint

After the first puffs a nice soothing feeling in all my broken arms and legs. I must say it works miracles if you have sports injuries.
Light clear headed high puts you in an easy going mode. I turned into a YES man.”

“This budd is in a league of its own. Super potent strain with decent CBD that will have you floating for a few hours. Very alert and euphoric but at the same time a pretty noticeable body high. Should've picked up more!”

“Just finished my week long tolerance break to this strain. And I gotta say, it was the perfect strain to come back to. As you would expect with Hawaiian Haze being a parent strain to Hawaiian Snow has an almost P
pineapple candy like smell to it, it smelled so sweet. The taste was great as well, doesn't leave a single bad taste in your mouth. Plus I'm absolutely fucking baked right now boys and girls so that's great ...”
“Overall best strain/concentrate I have ever used with 8 years experience. This sativa will knock back any depression you are feeling, awsome stuff.”

“This strain is a powerhouse for motivation. A couple of hits from my vape and I could feel happy energy buzzing through my spine. I found this helpful for doing housework or creative activities. Perfect for depression.”

“This budd is in a league of its own. Super potent strain with decent CBD that will have you floating for a few hours. Very alert and euphoric but at the same time a pretty noticeable body high. Should've picked up more!”

“Just finished my week long tolerance break to this strain. And I gotta say, it was the perfect strain to come back to. As you would expect with Hawaiian Haze being a parent strain to Hawaiian Snow has an almost P
pineapple candy like smell to it, it smelled so sweet. The taste was great as well, doesn't leave a single bad taste in your mouth. Plus I'm absolutely fucking baked right now boys and girls so that's great ...”
“This strain tastes exactly the same as my Martin HD28V guitar smells.”

“The bag aroma is mostly faint grape and classic haze. The flavor is big earthy, woody and rose. A very heady buzz, strong euphoria alongside typical lovely haze fog. No raciness that I can detect, but this elevator seems to have no top floor.  Very fun, probably not for rookies ;)”

“my top sativa is definitely Hawaiin Snow. rather potent strain. does wonders for my anxiety while giving some energy and great euphoria aswell. 
buds are also the nicest i've seen. light blue/green fluffy buds full of orange hairs, thrichs and sticky as hell. smells like sweet pine citrus fruit. worth trying!”

“I LOVE THIS! deffinently my favorit because it has 23% thc give pretty good  body high and an amazing head high. uesally i shut up and enjoy the weed but this was so good it made me talk and lauph so much. ALL my friends said i was 1000x funnier then i ever was! I love its taste its really fruity!”

“this shit right here is the shit. Stands out from other Sativas in my opinion. the high is so nice but so clear headed at the same time. will definitely get again and highly recommend trying it if you are a Sativa lover.”

“Bumped in to Hawaiian Snow this week and am abundantly impressed. I'm typically moody and emotionally unstable; it stabilized me. Smoked throughout the day for two days and stayed even-keeled emotionally, productive, friendly. Snow is a blessing, a gift. I love it!”

“I LOVE THIS! deffinently my favorit because it has 23% thc give pretty good  body high and an amazing head high. uesally i shut up and enjoy the weed but this was so good it made me talk and lauph so much. ALL my friends said i was 1000x funnier then i ever was! I love its taste its really fruity!”

“Wonderfully uplifting strain with high cannabinoid content, excellent scent and flavor. Though it is acceptable for nighttime use it is best complemented by a day in the sun and breeze. Powerfully antidepressant in effect, a strain that truly serves as a superior alternative to a cup of coffee upon waking. Makes for great smoke, produces a ton of oil in a rosin press, and is good for edibles too. Easily consider this...”
“Great quality of this flower but nog potent at all. Almost aptricot smell with light orange hairs. Would not buy again , I felt as tho I ran thru the eighth and never got to know this strain ,”
“love this strain muy buena mota, picked up a Gram and really enjoyed it. taste like white widow but on steroids.”

“This shit is FIRE! Had a wonderful caviar stick of this! Flower, oil and keif all Hawaiian snow. Great wake and bake and really a great way to start the day and a bit of jump in your step! I normally have major issues with sativas but this i did not have any issues with my anxiety on! Only issues is get a lot of water ready dry mouth like no other!”
“Great sativa. Found this strain to be very uplifting and energizing. Smells of tropical fruit and pine. If your into uplifting sativas this strain is a must try.”

“I LOVE THIS! deffinently my favorit because it has 23% thc give pretty good  body high and an amazing head high. uesally i shut up and enjoy the weed but this was so good it made me talk and lauph so much. ALL my friends said i was 1000x funnier then i ever was! I love its taste its really fruity!”
“Great sativa. Found this strain to be very uplifting and energizing. Smells of tropical fruit and pine. If your into uplifting sativas this strain is a must try.”

“this shit right here is the shit. Stands out from other Sativas in my opinion. the high is so nice but so clear headed at the same time. will definitely get again and highly recommend trying it if you are a Sativa lover.”

“my top sativa is definitely Hawaiin Snow. rather potent strain. does wonders for my anxiety while giving some energy and great euphoria aswell. 
buds are also the nicest i've seen. light blue/green fluffy buds full of orange hairs, thrichs and sticky as hell. smells like sweet pine citrus fruit. worth trying!”
“Very nice, and powerful strain. Euphoric, Happy, Laughing, Munchies, Deep Thoughts. Lots of thinking.”

“This strain is my absolute favorite. The smell of this strain is wonderful. It’s more of a floral scent that is less stunky and very pleasant. The high is functional and relaxing. You feel great after a smoke session with this bud.”

“EFFECTS
Great solid sativa. It's effects go straight to the head, immediately feeling light headed. Very good social high,  talkative and creative. Lasts a good amount of time! 
Seems to make my head feel strange. Found it difficult to stay focused.

SMOKE AND TASTE
Spicy, on the heavy side, tended to bring out a cough”
“hits you like the incoming tide on the Bay of Fundy.”

“Very nice sativa. Smooth old school smoke, with a nice hazy citrusy flavor. The smell is sweet and a little piney. The buds are classic sativa and loaded with trichomes. Fluffy and sticky. The high is instant and long lasting. It can be a bit racy and euphoric. Take baby steps with this lady.  She tends to be on the upper spectrum on thc% and can pack a punch. Can be a tougher and temperamental strain to grow. But if...”
“A nice high for during the day. Also seems to really help with my epilepsy.”

“very tasty and funny giggles.
i love it”
“This is like getting a good cup of coffee in the morning starting the day! perfect for getting things done and then a little relaxation in between...”
“It has a very light somewhat fruity smell, a nice smooth taste and mellow high”
“one of the best sativas I have ever tried. probably my favourite morning smoke ever. gets me feeling so good. sadly, I'm out now and need to order more :)”

“Love the smooth smoke, in a vape or sub this strain tasted like sweet flowers from Hawaii! Nice high, euphoric and mellow but not tired, a good one for outdoor play or chillin' at the camp or beach. Was easy on my asthma, no problem there, and I did not have any major 'burn out' from it. I'm partial to Sativas myself so that's my bias. Overall, one of my favourite strains, a sure but for me!”
“super uplifting and strong sativa. great for clarity, stimulation, with pain relief and antidepressant effects. excellent flavour profile and beautiful crystals.”
“It has a very light somewhat fruity smell, a nice smooth taste and mellow high”
“very uplifting and euphoric, one of my favourites for sure.”
“awesome stuff”
“had me laughing at everything, would recommend”
“LOVE IT!!! They have it for $6/G at Green Panda :)”

“I enjoy this strain during the day when I am working away at school projects.  It provides an overall feeling of relaxation and reduces any discomfort I am feeling.  Therefore, it is good for getting things done.  Do not expect any mind high allowing you to still think clearly and accomplish tasks.”
“Diosa Verde's Hawaiian Snow is the best!”

“This is one of my favs. Perfect daytime weed, helps me get things done. By the time I get home from work I am dying. I ll have a bit of this strain and I am set for like 4 hours. 
Makes me feel happy and relaxed. Energized and focused to get things done. 
BEWARE of smoking on an empty stomach if you suffer from Anxiety. Has caused me many panic attacks but I am getting used to them. They go away as fast as they come.”

“Hawaiian snow is the perfect daytime strain. The high is energizing, uplifting, and at the same time calming. It smells of citrus and carries a tropical scent. Perfect for social situations. Very please with the strain overall.”
“so strong, such a good high from just 1 hit”

“This strain was interesting and somewhat different than most that I am used to. When a moderate amount is smoked, it made me stay high for a really long time but the level of the high wasn't too off the charts. It was nice because it enabled me to be more functional while remaining high as fuck for a long time. 

When smoked in large amounts it put me straight on my ass for hours, unable to get up and eventually ju...”
“Made me super energetic.”
“super uplifting and strong sativa. great for clarity, stimulation, with pain relief and antidepressant effects. excellent flavour profile and beautiful crystals.”

“Love the smooth smoke, in a vape or sub this strain tasted like sweet flowers from Hawaii! Nice high, euphoric and mellow but not tired, a good one for outdoor play or chillin' at the camp or beach. Was easy on my asthma, no problem there, and I did not have any major 'burn out' from it. I'm partial to Sativas myself so that's my bias. Overall, one of my favourite strains, a sure but for me!”
“This is like getting a good cup of coffee in the morning starting the day! perfect for getting things done and then a little relaxation in between...”

“very tasty and funny giggles.
i love it”
“A nice high for during the day. Also seems to really help with my epilepsy.”

“Very nice sativa. Smooth old school smoke, with a nice hazy citrusy flavor. The smell is sweet and a little piney. The buds are classic sativa and loaded with trichomes. Fluffy and sticky. The high is instant and long lasting. It can be a bit racy and euphoric. Take baby steps with this lady.  She tends to be on the upper spectrum on thc% and can pack a punch. Can be a tougher and temperamental strain to grow. But if...”
“My fave strain for daytime. Perfect for whatever you need to get done.”
“Great product as sales associates claimed, great store”
“Amazing and happy energized mood!  I think this is my favorite!  This was great for a sunny day out by the pool with friends.  Lots of giggles and chatty.”

“Me and my husband have been smoking this strain for about a week and I love the high I get from it. We will just sit and laugh for hours at each other but it does make us super hungry lol. I must say I have been sleeping very well the past week so highly recommend this one for a good cerebral high.”
“very uplifting true to sativa a lively smoke no couch lock good motivator....”
“Very creative & relaxing strain. Tastes great and I really don't have anything negative to say about it. I definitely recommend it!”
“Cheap, tasty, and good.”
“Pairs nicely with lychee bubble tea and Converge.”

“Extremely slow growth veg plant(2-3 months)
56 day bloom
Always excellent fruit,  but not worth 5 months time.”
“Loved this strain! Really good upper! Would definitely recommended it!”
“I smoked this it was tasty asf”

“Very Strong High!

I smoking Weed since 2 Years and this is one of the best Weed I've Jever smoked.”
“i like this one. near to none sedative effects perfect for allday use and treats add and hydroid hypofunction in a really focused way for for me. try it!”
“very mellow high and taste and smells great”

“This strain is the best one thus far I have tried.  I can actually get chores done and daily activities.  I feel creative and uplifted with this medicinal.  When I am around friends I feel more relaxed and talkative feel more confident foresure puts all my anxiety at bay.
Highly recommend for people with anxiety.”

“Place second at 2011 Cannabis Cub in Amsterdam. 



Grown with love and commpassion to full expression. Well cured. Smooth smoke. Great for PSTD, Anxiety.  I find it Energetically Euphoric. You will find your self enjoying mundane tasks.



Available exclusively at Fweedom Collective in Ballard. Tell Tyler, Lorenzo sent you.”

“Hawaiian snow is definitely one of my favorite strains of sativas! Smoked it for the first time in Green House coffeeshop in Amsterdam and the quality of the product was amazing!  The taste is great, very sweet and some citrus flavor. You can feel the buzz quite fast and it makes you happy and energetic. I love this strain during the day, you function really well with it.”
“great tastes super bomb strong”

“Happy Cakes brownies, edible
I have a low tolerance, so 1/4 brownie worked for me.  I felt happy & relaxed.  I could sleep or not sleep, but since it was time for bed, I went to sleep & slept well.”
“Very Friendly smoke. Calms me right down. I get a long sleep after about an hour or two after consuming it.”
“one of the greatest tastes and smells amazing super stonie great choice”

“This sativa was a nice way to start my morning.  It was energetic and uplifting, but also relaxed my muscles and assisted with body stiffness. The overall taste of this was tropical, with hints of pineapple and an undertone of skunk. The high from this strain was stimulating and energetic. It has a head buzz that works well if you have to be productive, go to work or socialize.  I also thought that the strain helped ...”
“fresh mouth , not dry mouth”
“Very very good high great for depression and anxiety. Cannabis cub winnar!”
“it's good for smoking with yo niggas and laughing”

“One of my favorites! Taste is fantastic, very special. Starts with a super strong hit to the head followed by a very euphoric and uplifted feeling. I would recommend it for social activity or weed-adventures! ;)”
“Love at first anything”
“Very cool high as fuck but focus on my Work and shit, smoke it in the morming with this shit i cant sleep”
“One of my favorites. This strain hits the body first, and then, the head. This HS is great for getting into a project. I'm liking the Hawaiian🌴 strains more and more.”
“One of my favorite sativas. Delicious floral aroma and flavor. Smooth smoke.”
“hella bomb I had to smoke a couple bowls though to get a strong buzz. I'm glad I picked H.S. up because when I went to go pick up more they were out.”
“Definitely a get s**t done kinda bud!”

“Very nice strain. Clean high, focused and not dazed like I find kush makes me. The flavour and smell of the buds are amazing. Reminiscent of a blueberry or grapefruit. I can smell the fruity high CBDness of the strain and I like it :D”
“Works great for day use, not tired, worked like sales associate claimed. Good shop..”
“Get ready for Euphorialand.”

“HS is like getting a few good cups of coffee in the morning and starting the day! Perfect when vaporized into a large waterless chamber (not bag) as I do all flower. Excellent Sativa to keep you alert yet takes pain and stress away. 24+ % thc but mostly body stone & just enough in the head for a mood changer.
I'm an all day every day Vaper.”
“earthy tropical taste, great head high. It was mostly a up beat laughing high”
“luv it”

“Strain had a sourish smell to it. Very kiefy, and gave a relaxed, calm high. Gives a hashy feeling in the throat when exhaled, will tire the throat out if used with a bong. High didn't last very long.”
“I absolutely love this strain for anxiety... definitely uplifting and happiness off of this green... mellow and good flavor for sure.”
“Amazing. Lovely white colour and sweet blueberry flavours. Focused clean high. In love with this strain”
“Smells great! Makes me happy & is perfect for day time use.”

“Very good strian
In the first 10-25 Minutes extremely High ( Sativa) after about 40-60 Minutes you get chilled and you get a little bit Stoned (Indica)

5* very good strain to chill with your friends  :)”
“This strain is a must smoke for any true smoker...”
“Really strong powerful high one of the best ones I had”
“I had it again earlier, but I think it was an outdoor weed. So it was different. More potent this time. I really enjoy the flavor, but still not my top.”

“Not my favorite, but it gets the job done. It's a serious mental high, nothing else, you don't feel much different, but you don't acknowledge pain. Great for social smokers and it doesn't make you go dumb. Sadly, it's not that powerful.”

“One of the best weeds I've had. Quite strong, with a nice taste and aroma, and a very mellow, uplifting and cheerful high. Strongly recommended, especially for situations where you don't want to zone out or doze off. Major thumbs up.”
“Very energetic high! Felt like dancing and socializing with people. Definitely recommended for parties and small get-togethers :)”
“Very Nice Strain,Great tasting,Nice clear buzzzz,Bud was a little bushy but not bad,Also was a Great price at $5gr,Would buy again,as i see back on Menu”
“Got it in MI. 90% sativa 10% indica - I felt highly energetic and the need to be active. The perfect sativa. Very frosty light green buds. Would buy this every time.”
“that shit dank”

“Decent priced meds at got meds in Lansing. ..creeper. .I'm not going to grow it so that's why the bad grade but no not bad. ..you should get some some time you'll like the one that smells the best of everything in the place. .”
“heady.”
